title: Mavic to re-enter North American market: ‘There isn’t much off the table’
content:
We sat down with the storied French company about their reintroduction, new products, existing product support, and yes, the Mavic Open Pro.

Read the full article at Mavic to re-enter North American market: ‘There isn’t much off the table’ on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
